data.message: Hahaha from the comments it looks like you chose the wrong side Em. To bad dude,but Trump isn't a racist or any of that. You would rather believe the garbage then take 5 minutes to look for yourself. That's ignorance. 5 minutes of research will blow your little mind on what Trump has done for non white communities. So if you say choose you or the further of this country, I'm pretty sure your gonna lose. Just sayin lol

replies.message: 😂😂😂 thx Brad Sentell is that supposed to hurt my feelings.. Lol oh no he called me stupid I need a safe place 😨😨😨.
What has Trump done for non-white communities? Just curious...

In 2 minutes of search I've pulled up several discrimination lawsuits and a quote from a book in which A former employee of his wrote that Trump said "laziness is a characteristic in blacks" and when asked about it Trump said most of what was in the book was probably true.  I wonder what I could find if I actually spent a whole day at it 🤔
Not at all...!! Most people who think like #45 does get the cheapest seats...!! Lmao snowflake.

Bryan Sweigard you are right. I live near Michigan City Indiana and when Trump built his hotel and casino no one was hating his ass, not hating on the jobs he created or the revenue to the city, or the fucking clean up the city decided to do because of it. Smh how easily the sheeple forget.
